## Block.appendDummyInput() method

Shortcut for appending a dummy input row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
appendDummyInput(opt_name?: string): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this input again. Should be unique to this block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Input

The input object created.
